name: Backend API PRD
description: Standard RESTful API service with CRUD operations, authentication, and database integration

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A RESTful API service providing core business logic, data persistence, and integration with external systems.

sections.title: Problem Statement
sections.content: Applications need a reliable, scalable backend to handle requests, manage data, and coordinate with frontend services.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: CRUD operations, user authentication with JWT, request validation, error handling, rate limiting

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: Performance < 200ms (p95), 99.9% uptime, HTTPS enforced, horizontal scaling support

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content: Node.js 18+, Express, MongoDB/PostgreSQL, JWT, Zod validation, Swagger/OpenAPI

sections.title: Interfaces
sections.content: Endpoints: GET /v1/resources?page&limit, POST /v1/resources, GET /v1/resources/{id}, PATCH /v1/resources/{id}, DELETE /v1/resources/{id}. Include pagination (page, limit), idempotency keys for POST, 429 handling, and error model {code,message,details}.

sections.title: Data Retention & Privacy
sections.content: PII minimization, encryption at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.2+), data retention 13 months, documented DSRs (export/delete), audit log retention 90 days.

sections.title: Observability & SRE
sections.content: Structured logs (JSON), tracing with OpenTelemetry, RED metrics (Rate, Errors, Duration), dashboards for p50/p95/p99 latency, alerting: warn p95>250ms 5m; critical p95>400ms 10m; error rate >0.5% 10m.

sections.title: Failure Modes & Resilience
sections.content: Timeouts (client 5s, upstream 2s), retries with exponential backoff (3 attempts), circuit breaker on upstream dependency, bulkhead threading for DB pool, graceful shutdown SIGTERM 15s.

sections.title: Security
sections.content: OIDC authentication, JWT validation with clock skew tolerance, RBAC for admin/user roles, input validation (Zod), output encoding, OWASP top 10 checks, secrets via environment or vault.
